metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5501 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Integer overflow in libjasper/jpc/jpc_tsfb.c in JasPer 1.900.17 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted file.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> doesn't crash without ubsan enabled, marking as ignored no fix as of 2018-06-19

criterions.comment: jasper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
